Dali RUST

▪ ▪ ▪ ▪ ▪ ▪ ▪

Дали РУСТ

Dali RUST

Filmography (extracts)

Director

2019 - The Balcony of Europe (Балкон Европы) [documentary, 60 mn]

2012 - Marina's House (Дом Марины) [documentary, 57 mn]

Writer

2019 - The Balcony of Europe (Балкон Европы) from Dali RUST [documentary, 60 mn]

Awards :

Marina's House :

Best documentary, Festival ''Cinema and literature'', Gatchina (Russia), 2014

Biography

Was born in Lithuania and now lives in two countries, traveling between Klaipeda in Lithuania and Kaliningrad or Moscow in Russia. She has graduated from the Vilnius University (faculty of economics) and Institute of International Relations and Social-Political Studies. Dali has been working as a production manager at the Lithuanian Film Studio and at the Kinema Studio as casting director of Šarūnas Bartas. She has been collaborating with newspaper “Rossiyskaya Gazeta” and directing auteur TV programs on the “Premier” TV channel (Kaliningrad) and the 5 Channel (Lithuania). Other her documentaries: “Matrosovka” (2007), “The Keeper of Time” (2009), “Nadezda” (2010), “Boundary Zone” (2011).
